scripts.build: npm run clean && node ./node_modules/nwb/lib/bin/nwb build-web-module && cp -r ./lib/* ./app/
scripts.yo: export DEBUG=true && npm run build && echo && yo trailblazer
scripts.start: node ./node_modules/nodemon/bin/nodemon -w ./app/templates -e js -x 'npm run yo -- --name=some-name --description=some-description --product-version=0.0.1 --repo=some-repo --author-name=some-author-name --author-email=some-author-email --author-url=some-author-url --homepage=some-homepage && node ./demo/node_modules/babel-cli/bin/babel-node ./demo/server.js || exit 1'
